altTitles.en: Star in the daytime / Star in daytime
The Star that Rises in the Day

altTitles.ja: 昼間に輝く星

description.en: Yura Hwang is an actress who only gets to act as an extra for all seven years since she started her career. She got betrayed by her boyfriend that got married to another person. But in all that mess, she met again with the famous senior actor for the second time in her newest movie! Will her path to becoming a star come true?
description.pl: Yura Hwang, aktorka, która przez siedem lat, odkąd rozpoczęła karierę, występuje tylko jako statystka. Została zdradzona przez swojego chłopaka, który wziął ślub z inną dziewczyną. W całym tym chaosie, udało jej się spotkać ze słynnym aktorem w swoim najnowszym filmie! Czy jej droga do zostania gwiazdą się spełni?

title.en: For You, I’ll Dress up in a Lie

altTitles.ja: 君のためにボクは嘘を着飾る

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no Tame ni Boku wa Uso wo Kikazaru

description.en: Kokuyou Yuzuru, a bit of a plain boy, is always together with his best friend from childhood, Shiratama Kotaro. They thought they could stay together forever even after they entered middle school... One day, something happens that changes their relationship drastically.
description.ja:
ちょっぴり地味な男子「黒曜結弦」は親友の幼馴染「白玉小太郎」といつも一緒。
中学生になってもずっと一緒にいられると思ったのに…。
ある日二人の関係を大きく変える出来事が起きる。

description.en:
A so·​cial op·​er·​a·​tor 
1. An individual involved in mending the balance of the welfare of human beings in society.
Zuoh Cidio a man with a hanged mans Past answers the call of a troubled high school girl. Together they walk through the horrors of the commonfolk.

A hot-tempered Taoist priest finds himself entangled with an arrogant vampire, drawn into a whirlwind of love and hatred fueled by karmic ties from their past lives.

In the present day, he’s barely scraping by, working odd jobs on a film set. But one day, he senses a powerful, ominous energy. When he looks up, he’s shocked to find that the source is none other than the nation’s biggest movie star, Shen Que?! The charming and sophisticated actor the world admires—is actually a thousand-year-old vampire?

“You’re not getting away from me this time!”

A strange old lady appears before the 31-year-old protagonist, who graduated from a provincial university, has no connections, and no impressive credentials!

"Buy one for me..."

The old lady suddenly thrusts a piece of gum forward, claiming that chewing it will make you smarter, better at work, and even more likable.

The protagonist, caught off guard, ends up buying it. During a job interview, He absentmindedly swallows the gum, and from that moment on, things start to strangely go His way...

title.en: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita

altTitles.ja: 元暗殺者、転生して貴族の令嬢になりました

altTitles.en: A Former Assassin Was Reborn as a Blue-Blooded Daughter

description.en:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
description.ja:
任務に失敗した暗殺者が転生したのは、公爵令嬢のセレナ。「私は元暗殺者。なりすますなんて簡単だ」そう思っていたセレナだが、 頭がお花畑な母親や、彼女を蹴落とそうと周りを欺く義妹などとの感覚のズレに日々いら立ち、生きづらさを感じていた。 
マウントだらけのお茶会に、愛憎ドロドロな学園生活……周囲からの嫌がらせを冷めた目で痛烈にかわしながらも、その冷徹さゆえに疎まれ孤立していくセレナ。 そしてある日、義妹が第二王子と婚約することを知り、ついに家出を決意する。しかしそこに第一王子のエヴァンが現れて--!?
愛を知らない元暗殺者が貴族社会を突き進む、異世界転生コメディときどきラブ!？

altTitles.ja: 救済系Vッタラー✟メシアちゃん

description.en: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.

title.en: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell

altTitles.fa: مشاوره‌های عشقی از اربابِ بزرگِ دوزخ

altTitles.uk: Любовні поради від величного герцоґа Пекла

altTitles.pl: Miłosne Porady od Wielkiego Księcia Piekieł

description.en: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
description.fa: دختر رویاهات روحشم خبر نداره که تو وجود داری. هیچ کمکی هم از دست دوستات بر نمیاد. خونواده‌ت هم از این قضیه خبر ندارن. خب حالا برای مشاوره گرفتن به کی رو می‌زنی؟ کی می‌تونه تورو که یه عاشق دل‌خسته‌ای، اساسی کمک کنه تا برای همه‌چیز آماده باشی؟ اگه یه نوجوون معمولی مثل پال باشی، یه شیطان گولاخ از اعماق دخمه‌های جهنم احضار می‌کنی و جدی جدی امیدواری که همه‌چی درست پیش بره!
description.fr: Un étrange étudiant invoque un puissant démon. Que peut-il bien vouloir ?
description.it:
La ragazza dei tuoi sogni a stento sa che esisti, gli amici non ti possono aiutare, la famiglia non ne sa nulla. Ma allora, dove cercare consigli d'amore? Chi può provvedere a darti quell'assistenza essenziale per il tuo cuore? Se sei il ragazzo della porta accanto, Paul, allora ti basta evocare un potente demone dai più profondi abissi dell'Inferno e, francamente, sperare per il meglio.  


---

altTitles.ja: ふるまぷら

description.en: Energetic girl Kyou meets quiet girl Makoto, who only communicates using sign boards numbered 1 to 10. At first, these polar opposites interact rather one-sidedly, but gradually become able to understand each other's feelings.
description.pt-br: A garota animada Kyou conhece a garota quieta Makoto, que só se comunica usando placas de numeradas de 1 a 10. No início, estes polos opostos interagem muito unilateralmente, mas gradualmente se tornam capazes de compreender os sentimentos uma da outra.

description.en: Akira Azuma is a tall, attractive, but aloof Kusunoki High School freshman girl and all-around athlete. Hiyori Motohashi is a short Kusunoki freshman girl in the school's broadcasting club. While trying to set up coverage on Akira, Hiyori finds herself attracted to Akira's mysterious charm.
description.pt-br: Azuma Akira é alta, tem boa aparência, é boa em todos os esportes, e é o centro das atenções no momento da escola Kusonoki. Motohashi Hiyori é uma caloura no clube de jornalismo da escola Kusunoki. Sua primeira tarefa no clube é entrevistar Akira, ela se encanta pelo jeito misterioso de Akira e decide que vai conseguir entrevistá-la de qualquer jeito! … Será que ela vai conseguir?

description.en:
Dam, who at some point stopped growing, avoids people and leaves to the forest.  
  
 [Author's twitter](https://twitter.com/dahongcomic)

Zhou Mingrui possessed and reborn Klein Moretti, who committed suicide because of the sealed object "Antigonus Family Notes". In order to return to Earth, Zhou Mingrui held the "transfer ceremony" again, but accidentally entered a mysterious gray fog space, during which he inadvertently pulled the
consciousness of Audrey Hall and Alger Wilson into the gray fog space. In order to take the lead in the conversation, he disguised himself as a hidden existence in recovery, calling himself "Mr. Fool" and began a magnificent legend of becoming a god.

altTitles.ja: 虐殺ハッピーエンド

description.en: High school student Kusakabe Makoto has to work all day to raise money for the treatment of his younger sister, who suffers from a serious illness. The father is unemployed, the mother ran away, leaving the children, bullying at work … Despite all this, he does not lose hope and continues to live for her sister. But having learned that she did not have long, Makoto falls into despair. Fear of the unknown causes him to take a different look at the value of human life.
description.ru: Старшекласснику Кусакабэ Макото приходится работать дни напролёт, чтобы собрать деньги на лечение младшей сестры, страдающей от тяжёлой болезни. Отец безработный, мать сбежала, бросив детей, издевательства на работе… Несмотря на всё это, он не теряет надежды и продолжает жить ради сестры. Но узнав, что ей осталось недолго, Макото впадает в отчаяние. Страх перед неизвестностью заставляет его по-другому взглянуть на ценность человеческой жизни.
description.uz: Yuqori maktab o‘quvchisi Kusakabe Makoto og‘ir xastalikdan aziyat chekayotgan singlisining davolanishi uchun pul yig‘ish uchun kun bo‘yi ishlashga majbur. Otasi ishsiz, onasi bolalarini tashlab qochib ketgan, ishida bezorilik qilgan... Bularning barchasiga qaramay, u umidini yo'qotmaydi va singlisi uchun yashashda davom etadi. Ammo ko'p vaqt o'tmaganini bilib, Makoto tushkunlikka tushadi. Noma'lum narsadan qo'rqish uni inson hayotining qadriga boshqacha qarashga majbur qiladi.
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Kusakabe Makoto precisa trabalhar o dia todo para arrecadar dinheiro para o tratamento de sua irmã mais nova, que sofre de uma doença grave. O pai está desempregado, a mãe fugiu, abandonando os filhos, bullying no trabalho… Apesar de tudo isso, ele não perde as esperanças e continua vivendo para a irmã. Mas ao saber que não tinha muito tempo, Makoto cai em desespero. O medo do desconhecido faz com que ele olhe de forma diferente para o valor da vida humana.

title.en: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.ja: つれないほど青くて あざといくらいに赤い

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsurenai Hodo Aokute Azatoi Kurai ni Akai

altTitles.es-la: Tan frío como el azul y tan agresivo como el rojo

altTitles.vi: Xanh đến nỗi Lạnh Lùng, Đỏ tới mức Xảo Quyệt

description.en: Is this senior... female? Male? Neutral? Demonic? A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.
description.ja: 覗いてはいけない、だから、覗きたい。　この先輩は…女性？　男性？　中性？　魔性??　好奇心という不治の病を患う転校生が出会ったのは、美しく、可愛らしく、格好よく、恐ろしい、謎の存在（ヒト）だった。
description.ru:
Мой сэмпай... Кто же это? Девушка? Парень? Оно? Демон?.. Главный герой — переведенный ученик старшей школы, страдающий неизлечимым чувством любопытства натыкается на красивое, милое, крутое и опасное создание (человека?). С этого момента и начинаются их необычные отношения.

(Source: mangalib)
description.vi: Liệu senpai này là... Nữ giới? Nam giới? Vô giới? Ác quỷ giới?? Một học sinh chuyển trường mắc một căn bệnh vô phương cứu chữa gọi là sự hiếu kì đã gặp phải một tồn tại bí ẩn dưới hình dạng của một con người vô cùng xinh đẹp và dễ thương nhưng cũng rất lạnh lùng và đáng sợ. Một câu chuyện tình yêu nơi vực thẳm, một câu chuyện ma quái đầy gợi cảm, mang đến cho bạn bởi tác giả đứng đầu về một thế hệ mới của truyện kinh dị...!

altTitles.ja: とある科学の心理掌握

altTitles.ar: مانجا الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي - مينتل-آوت

description.ar:
هذه القصة الفرعية من سلسلة توارو ببطولة الملكة النحلة شوكهو ميساكي

اقتربت انتخابات مجلس طلاب توكيواداي. شوكهو ميساكي، وهي صاحبة أكبر زمرة في المدرسة، دخلت الانتخابات غريمةً لنائبة رئيسة المجلس ومتحدية لها. وأثناء الانتخابات دخل [أثرٌ] مُعَيّن مدرسة البنات المخمليات، ويدعي أنه المصنف الأول السابق...؟!
description.en: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
description.id: Pemilihan presiden dewan siswa Tokiwadai semakin mendekat. Shokuhou Misaki, salah satu kandidat utama, tengah berada dalam kampanye pemilihan meskipun tidak sesuai ekspektasinya sendiri karena pengaruh orang-orang di sekitarnya dan takdir menjadi kepala kelompok terbesar...!!
description.ru: Приближаются выборы в студенческий совет Токивадая. Шокухо Мисаки, одна из ведущих кандидатов, находится в разгаре избирательной кампании, несмотря на ее собственные ожидания из-за окружающих ее людей и судьбы быть главой крупнейшей клики!..

altTitles.ja: Mコレクション

description.en: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)

altTitles.ja: おさななじみの百合
ボクラノキセキ

description.en: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…

altTitles.ja: 人外さんの嫁

description.en:
Hinowa Tomari is a normal high schooler, until one day he's told that he has to become the wife of a mysterious creature called Kanenogi.  
  
This is the start of their newly married life.

Ji-woo transfers to a rural school with his parents who have returned to farming. The fresh air, the relaxed atmosphere... he liked them all. However, for a moment that seemed like a pleasant start,

Ji-woo discovers that the flower garden that he has carefully cared for has been messed up.. Ji-woo, who thought it was someone's territoriality, suspects Dongchan, who was particularly harsh to him at school.
First off, that bangs! I'll start with those bangs that make it impossible to know what you're thinking!!
description.fr: La vie à la campagne est censée être idyllique, non ? Un endroit paisible rempli d'aimables voisins au grand cœur, pas vrai ? C'est ce que Jiwoo attend avec impatience... Mais de tous les voisins qu'il aurait pu avoir, c'est Dongchan qu'il est le sien. Froid, distant et insondable, Dongchan n'est pas le plus accueillant du voisinage. En fait, on dirait qu'il n’a pas du tout envie que Jiwoo et sa famille s’installent ici. Déconcerté mais pas découragé, Jiwoo fait de son mieux pour s'adapter à la vie à la campagne... jusqu'à ce qu'il s'avère que quelqu'un essaie de chasser sa famille d'ici. Jiwoo a des soupçons, mais sera-t-il capable de trouver le vrai coupable ?
description.ko:
귀농한 부모님을 따라 시골 학교로 전학 온 지우. 상쾌한 공기, 여유로운 분위기.. 모두 마음에 들었다. 그러나 기분 좋게 새출발 할 수 있을 것 같았던 것도 잠시,
지우네가 정성껏 가꾼 꽃밭이 엉망이 된 걸 발견하는데..
누군가의 텃세일 거라 생각한 지우는 학교에서 자신에게 유독 까칠했던 동찬을 의심한다.
일단 저 앞머리! 무슨 생각 하는지 알 수 없게 하는 저 앞머리부터 까고 만다!!

title.en: On My Way to Kill God

altTitles.es-la: De camino a matar a Dios

description.en:
“I’ll kill you… Demon God!”

Because of the demons, humanity was thrown into a battle they could not refuse. The people dragged into Helacion hunted monsters in a desperate struggle to survive.

To escape, and to take revenge against the Demon God, they must endlessly grow and become even stronger!

altTitles.ja: 罪と快

description.en:
Under immense pressure to achieve academically both at school and at home, Minedera Zen turns to taking upskirt photos of girls as a form of escape from his life. One day, while doing his usual rounds, Zen is caught by the subject of his upskirt at the time, Houjou Ayame…

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [FAKKU](<https://www.fakku.net/hentai/pleasure-corruption-english>)

Radiana didn't want to die. Offered as a sacrifice to the sun prince in place of her scheming halfsister, she decided to do whatever it takes to survive... but never dreamed it would be in the bed of the sun prince! Oratio is sick and tired of receiving human sacrifices. A disillusioned sun prince with the ability to read minds, Oratio involuntarily rescues Radiana from the burning altar...and is shocked to see that she can meet his eyes without bursting into flames. His interest piqued, Oratio offers to let Radiana live... by spending a passionate night in his arms, but Radiana would rather die than go to his bed willingly. Unbeknownst to them, however, there are forces that will stop at nothing to break them apart. Will Oratio and Radiana realize they're meant to be together... before their enemies come to break them apart?
description.pl: Radiana nie chciała umrzeć. Złożona w ofierze Księciu Słońca w miejsce swojej podstępnej przyrodniej siostry, postanowiła zrobić wszystko, aby przetrwać... ale nigdy nie myślała, że znajdzie się w łożu Księcia Słońca!

description.en: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.ja: 幼少の頃から「幻妖」と呼ばれる存在が見えた少年・夜島学郎。高校入学初日、ひょんなことから出会ったサブカル好きの幻妖「鵺」に校内の幻妖退治を依頼されるが――…？
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!
description.pt-br: Yajima é capaz de enxergar Espíritos desde pequeno. Em sua nova escola há uma sala que mais ninguém consegue ver. E dentro dela mora uma Espírito que ama jogar videogames. Uma nova saga moderna de exorcistas começa agora!

Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."

altTitles.ja: となりはふつうのニジカ（ちゃん）

altTitles.en: Next to me is the Ordinary Nijika (-chan)

description.en:
Since Aira was a little girl, boys have protected her because of her lovable appearance.

However, she never asked for their protection, or for people to gossip about how she’s so full of herself. Troublesome occurrences like those happen to her because of her appearance, so she decided that once she entered high school, she’d play the “girlish Aira” role so she wouldn’t have to deal with more bothersome situations.

One day, a person named Nijika, came to live in Aira’s house. Nijika’s family had been transferred overseas and they wanted Nijika to stay with an acquainted family they knew.

However, Aira finds out later that Nijika is actually… a guy!? Nijika who was biologically born a male, wears the clothes they want to wear, puts on the makeup they want to put on, and confidently expresses their feelings without a care in the world.

Aira doesn’t know if they are a guy, a girl, or even her friend, but one thing is certain. Aira’s extraordinary everyday life with Nijika has now started!
description.ja: 超絶美少女と突然の同居生活！…と思ったけど!?　見た目で期待されるイメージとのギャップに悩んでいるあいらは自由奔放な虹翔（にじか）と出会ってから自分の気持ちに素直でいたいと思うようになって…？

Damals hatte Dokja noch überhaupt keine Ahnung. Er hatte keine Ahnung, dass sein Lieblings-Web-Roman ‘Drei Wege um die Apokalypse zu überleben’ Realität wird und dass er der einzige ist, der weiß wie der Weltuntergang aussehen wird. Er hatte auch keine Ahnung, dass er letztendlich der Protagonist von diesem Roman werden würde. Jetzt begibt sich Dokja auf eine Reise, um den Lauf der Geschichte zu ändern und die Menschheit zu retten!

description.en: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
description.es:
En ese entonces, Dokja no tenía idea de que su novela web favorita, Tres maneras de sobrevivir al apocalipsis, cobraría vida y que solo él sabría cómo iba a terminar el mundo. Tampoco tenía idea de que se convertiría en el protagonista de esta novela transformada en realidad. Ahora Dokja debe embarcarse en un viaje para alterar el curso de la historia y salvar a la humanidad de una vez por todas.

description.ja:
「ありえない...これは俺が知っている展開だ。」 10年以上読み続けた小説の最終話を読んだ日、世界は滅亡し小説の世界が現実となった。 平凡で冴えないサラリーマンの主人公・ドクシャ。 そんな彼の趣味はWEB小説『滅亡した世界で生き残る３つの方法』を読むこと。 ついに最終話を読み終えたかと思いきや、作者からのメッセージが届き小説のモンスターと登場人物が突如現れ、新たな世界が幕を開けた！ 「俺は、この世界の結末を知る唯一の読者となった。」 たった一人だけが読み終えたファンタジー小説が現実に。 果たしてドクシャは滅亡した世界を救うことができるのか？

description.en: Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.
description.ja: 命を落とし、異世界に転生したミリオタ少年は、知識を活かして兵器を製造して戦うことに！前世で叶わなかった想いを胸に、迫り来る魔物から人々を守れ!!! その力で、少年は伝説になる！――かもしれない。
description.pt:
Hotta Youta foi morto enquanto voltava para casa do trabalho em uma noite fria. Ele acordou sendo carregado por uma mulher com orelhas de coelho! Apresentando a reencarnação, armas e harém, é uma história de armas e magia que dá ao nosso protagonista uma nova vida… e um novo começo!   
*Adaptado da web/light novel de mesmo nome.*  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/yametakashi)

title.en: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu

altTitles.ja: 勇者さまは報酬に人妻をご希望です

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma o go Kiboudesu

altTitles.en: The Hero Wants a Married Woman as a Reward

description.en:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
description.id:
Pahlawan ini keji...!!  Pahlawan, Chloe, adalah pahlawan aneh yang menuntut hadiah saat menyelamatkan orang. Dan yang membuatnya berbeda adalah hadiahnya...Dia hanya senang dengan wanita yang sudah menikah, jadi dia menuntut Milf yang paling cantik di kota. 

"Jika kau ingin aku menyelamatkan kota, berikan aku milf yang paling cantik" 

Sebuah cerita unik fantasi erotis yang dibuat oleh pahlawan!
description.ja: この勇者、下劣ッ…！！勇者・クロエは人々を救う際に報酬を要求する、異質な勇者だった。そして彼が異質なのはその報酬であった…彼は人妻にしか興奮しない為、その町で一番美しい人妻を要求するのであった。「町を救ってほしければ、一番美しい人妻を寄越せ」異色の勇者がおりなすエロファンタジー！

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム フラナガン・ブーン戦記

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gandamu Furanagan Boon Senki

description.en:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!

altTitles.ja: 幼女無双
幼女無双 ～仲間に裏切られた召喚師、魔族の幼女になって【英霊召喚】で溺愛スローライフを送る～

altTitles.ja-ro: Youjo Musou: Nakama ni Uragirareta Shoukanshi, Mazoku no Oujo ni Natte "Eirei Shoukan" de Dekiai Slow Life wo Okuru

altTitles.en: Unparalleled Little Girl: A Summoner Betrayed by Friends, Become a Demon Little Girl, and Live a Doting Slow Life with "Summoning of the Spirits"

description.en: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!

altTitles.ja: みだれたふたりのみたされごはん

altTitles.en: Make Me Eat! Make Me Happy!
A Satisfying Meal For An Obscene Pair

description.ja: どんなにお腹がすいても暴飲暴食はしないと決めているＯＬ・氷川瑠奈。時間も場所も関係なく食べたいときにただ食べるＪＫ・小泉一花。節制しているからこそいかに美味しく食べるかに妥協を許さない瑠奈。食にこだわりがないゆえに美味しく食べる方法を何も知らない一花。そんな二人が一緒に食べる、"みたされごはん"いただきます！

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed...
description.ja: 離島「花山島」に東京からやってきた女子高生、千堂千尋。独自の風俗が残るその島で、人の欲望が暴走する事件が起き始める。殺人、放火、強姦…‥際限ない欲望が離島を地獄に変えていく――。

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

altTitles.vi: Ba Chị Em Nhà Mikadono Dễ Đối Phó Thật Đấy

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

description.en:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.ja: シャイ

description.en: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
description.fr:
Au milieu du XXIe siècle, le monde était au bord de la troisième guerre mondiale. Mais des super-héros du monde entier sont apparus et ont contribué à l'avènement d'une ère de paix. La crise ayant été évitée, les Héros sont retournés dans leur pays d'origine où ils apportent désormais leur aide pour les affaires intérieures. C'est l'histoire de la jeune héroïne japonaise nommée « Shy »…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.id: Di pertengahan abad ke-21, dunia berada di ambang Perang Dunia ke III. Tapi pahlawan super dari seluruh dunia muncul dan membantu membawa era perdamaian. Bersamaan menghindari krisis, para Pahlawan kembali ke negara asal mereka di mana mereka sekarang membantu masalah-masalah dalam negerinya. Ini adalah kisah tentang pahlawan muda dari Jepang bernama "Shy"…
description.pt: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada "Shy"…
description.ru: В середине 21-го века мир был на гране третьей мировой войны. Но супер герои, появившиеся по всему миру, помогли принести в мир покой. Разобравшись с этим, герои вернулись в свои страны, где теперь помогают с местными проблемами. Эта же история о японской героини “Стесняшка”…
description.th: ในช่วงกลางศตวรรษที่ 21 โลกได้ตกอยู่ในยุคของสงครามโลกครั้งที่สาม แต่แล้วได้มีฮีโร่ปรากฏตัวขึ้นจากทั่วโลก และช่วยนำพายุคแห่งสันติภาพกลับคืนมา หลังจากวิกฤตได้ผ่านพ้นไป ฮีโร่แต่ละคนได้กลับไปยังประเทศบ้านเกิดของพวกเขา เพื่อช่วยเหลือภัยพิบัติที่เกิดขึ้นในของแต่ละประเทศของตัวเอง …นี่คือเรื่องราวเกี่ยวกับ สาวน้อยฮีโร่ชาวญี่ปุ่น ที่มีนามว่า "ฌาย"…
description.tr:
21. yüzyılın ortasında, dünya III. Dünya Savaşının eşiğindeydi. Süper kahramanlar dünyanın çeşitli yerlerinde ortaya çıktı ve barış çağını getirmeye yardımcı oldular. Kriz önlendiği için tüm kahramanlar kendi ülkelerine döndü ve iç meselelere yardım etmeye başladılar. Bu "SHY" adlı Japon Kadın Kahramanının hikayesi…?  


---

 Author's Twitter: [@bukimi397](https://twitter.com/bukimi397)
description.vi:
Vào giữa thế kỷ 21, trong số các anh hùng có mặt khắp nơi trên khắp thế giới xuất hiện một anh hùng siêu xấu hổ đến từ Nhật Bản với biệt danh là "Shy".
Cô gánh trên mình trách nhiệm của một anh hùng, mặc dù bản thân rất kém trong việc đối mặt với ánh mắt đến từ mọi người.
Dù gặp biết bao gian khó và khổ đau, nhưng Shy vẫn đứng lên vì những người xung quanh...! 
Không chỉ dừng ở những cuộc xung đột, SHY còn là câu chuyện về tình người, về sự đồng tâm hiệp lực của các anh hùng để cùng nhau tiến về phía trước!
Câu chuyện trưởng thành về anh hùng mang tấm lòng nhân ái!
description.es-la: A mediados del siglo 21, el mundo estaba al borde de la 3ra Guerra Mundial. Sin embargo, alrededor del mundo, héroes comenzaron a aparecer y ayudaron a traer la paz a esta era. Con esa crisis habiendo sido evitada, los héroes regresaron a sus paises de origen donde ahora ayudan con asuntos internos. Esta historia se trata de la joven heroína japonesa llamada "Shy"…
description.pt-br: Em meados do século 21, o mundo estava a beira de uma 3ª Guerra Mundial. Mas, ao redor de todo o globo, heróis começaram a aparecer e ajudaram a trazer paz a esta era. Com a crise evitada, os heróis retornaram para seus países de origem, onde eles agora ajudam com assuntos internos. Essa história é sobre a jovem heroína japonesa chamada “Shy”...

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)
description.ja: 野盗に村を襲われたリンは、窮地の中、１本の剣を手にする。その剣は英雄・ジークフリートの魂が宿った魔剣で、リンは圧倒的な力で野盗たちを制圧する。だが、リンの股間にはもう１本の凶悪な“剣”がそそり立っていて…!?
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

title.en: Hacking Ghost Karada ni Shika Kachi no Nai

altTitles.ja: HACKING GHOST〜カラダにしか価値のない学園〜

description.en:
In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei kills him.

With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability…

An unprecedented "body takeover" supernatural battle begins!
description.ja: 人類の20人に1人が「特殊能力」に目覚めた時代。霊と話せるだけの弱小能力者・滝神広人は、ある理由で最強の能力者である義姉・麗から激しく憎まれていた。能力者育成機関から卒業し、能力を自由に使役できるようになった瞬間、広人は麗によって殺される。「余命」は１年ーー。絶望する広人の前に、ある1人の霊が現れる。そこで告げられたのは、思いもよらない能力の秘密で‥‥。前代未聞の”カラダ乗っ取り系”異能バトル！

altTitles.ja: 双子と双子
最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

altTitles.ja: 魔法のつかいかた

description.en: I'm a sorcerer's apprentice. The sorcerer, Sentarou-san, kidnapped me from my mother and asked me to live with him. But Sentarou-san has probably killed someone before... Sakae Kusama's first full-length series, depicting the cool and gentle days of a useless adult and a lonely child, opens!

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

altTitles.ja: レッドブルー

description.en: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: 仮面ライダーアマゾン

description.en:
Amazon, a wild youth in the jungle, is remodeled by the ancient Inca science. With the "Bracelet of Gigi," the key that opens the door to the hidden treasure, on his arm, he protects the treasured ordnance and weaponry, as well as the future of mankind! 

The enemy is Gorgoth, a ten-faced demon who plans to conquer the world with the "Bracelet of Gaga," an opposing key!

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

description.en: I met my annoying ex-girlfriend again during the zombie apocalypse?!

altTitles.ja: 聖母の断罪

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ja: 親子3人で幸せな家庭を築いていた流（ながれ）一家。だが、息子の桐崇は学校でひそかに虐めにあっていた。そして起きてしまったある事件をきっかけに、息子を想う母の愛が暴走していく――。
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.
